name: anova_test
description: Perform one-way ANOVA to compare means across multiple groups. Assumes the dependent variable is normally distributed within each group.

file_path.description: Path to the file containing the dataset (CSV, Excel, JSON, or JSONL).

category_col.description: Name of the column containing group labels (categorical).

value_col.description: Name of the column containing numeric values to compare between groups.

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index (used only for Excel files). Default is 0.
